transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello hello. ha hai?
Customer: Ji, Adnan sir tumse baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Executive: ha boliye Pooja madam.
Customer: ha mai ye keh rahi thi ki aapne wo further try karte dekha tha usme?
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: computer ko?
Customer: Madam mai thoda office ke bahar hu.
Executive: Accha thik hai.
Customer: Abhi mujhe pata chal gaya madam wo location location ke hisab se mai Karnataka.
Executive: ha.
Customer: Thik hai madam I got it. But kya hai more leads me agar jayenge na more leads me agar jayenge to pure India ka aayega na.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute. Kya keh rahe the?
Customer: More leads me jo click karenge.
Executive: ha.
Customer: ha usme pura India ka location pe lekar ke. Okay location pe. Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Okay madam. To sir ek baat batayenge yaha pe jo aapka concern open hai kya mai ise close kar sakti hu?
Customer: Nahi madam mai thoda bahar hu office se bahar hu gaon se bahar hu.
Executive: ha?
Executive: Accha nahi nahi sir concern open hai na aapka to iske liye use close karna tha isliye mai puch rahi thi.
Customer: Kal subah ka time kal subah ka time le lijiye 10:30 you can call me.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai aap?
Customer: 10:30 you can call me up tomorrow.
Executive: 10:30 me. Okay.
Executive: Accha 10:30 pe kal baat ho jayegi aapse?
Customer: Okay no worries madam.
Executive: Okay thik hai sir concern open hai na aapka to isi ke liye use close karna tha isliye mai puch rahi thi.
Customer: Okay madam okay.
Executive: Okay sir thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about more leads.

- Executive wants to close the open concern.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about more leads option.

- Customer asked to call next day at 10:30.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, concern
